DOC.brief_summary: Nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC) is the tenth leading cancers in Taiwan and investigating its biomarker is important for understanding the mechanism of its pathogenesis.
DOC.brief_title: Investigating the Role of Mucin and Mucin Glycosylating Enzymes in Nasopharyngeal Carcinoma and Salivary Gland Cancer and Their Correlation With Clinical Prognosis
DOC.detailed_description: NPC is the tenth leading cancers in Taiwan and investigating its biomarker is important for understanding the mechanism of its pathogenesis.
DOC.criteria: NPC and salivary gland tumor diagnosed and treated in HTUH previous treatment or surgery
